body_html:
I thought you might misunderstand my question. I understand dd *= 2 is multiplication in-place, but how the value of dd transfer into cc? but if I used dd = dd * 2, the new values did not transfer to cc? There is no difference in the previous line: dd = cc and bb =aa.
BTW, in python (not pytorch Variable or Tensor), dd *= 2 and dd = dd * 2 both will not affect cc value.
Thank you.

BTW, in python (not pytorch Variable or Tensor), dd *= 2 and dd = dd * 2 both will not affect cc value.
Thank you.
body:
I thought you might misunderstand my question. I understand dd *= 2 is multiplication in-place, but how the value of dd transfer into cc? but if I used dd = dd * 2, the new values did not transfer to cc? There is no difference in the previous line: dd = cc and bb =aa.
BTW, in python (not pytorch Variable or Tensor), dd *= 2 and dd = dd * 2 both will not affect cc value.
Thank you.
